text: Parque Puebla is a shopping mall in the La Cienega area of Puebla City, Mexico, located between the Stadium District and the Instituto Tecnológico de Puebla near the Mexico City–Puebla tollway (150D).http://periodicocentral.mx/2017/vida-y-estilo/item/17511-inauguran- centro-comercial-parque-puebla-estas-son-las-tiendas-que-encontraras It was developed by Fibra Danhos at a cost of 4.5 billion pesos (240 million U.S. dollars).https://www.eleconomista.com.mx/estados/Centros-comerciales-preven- aumentar-inversion-en-Puebla-20180221-0034.html Governor Rafael Moreno of the State of Puebla inaugurated the center in January 2017. Parque Puebla is anchored by Sears and Liverpool department stores and a Cinepolis multi-cinema complex. A Fiesta Inn hotel will be built at the complex,https://www.eleconomista.com.mx/estados/Destinaran-15-mdp-a-eventos- para-atraer-turismo-en-Puebla-20180209-0036.html and he 500-million-peso (28-million-dollar) "Michin" aquarium is set to be added to the complex in 2019.http://www.periodicocentral.mx/2017/gobierno/item/21459-acuario-michin- en-parque-puebla-sera-tipo-disneyland-y-abrira-hasta-2019 ==References== Category:Shopping malls in Puebla City
title: Parque Puebla
